text: George Clooney is an award - winning actor, a new father and a world - class prankster. Now he can add “ start - up founder who hit the jackpot ” to his résumé. Casamigos, the tequila brand that Mr. Clooney founded with his friends Rande Gerber and Mike Meldman in 2013, said Wednesday that it had sold itself to the spirits giant Diageo.
